name: God's Employee
description: Left click to destroy, middle click for open/close upgrade menu, right click to heal the shield for 10 coins. Upgrade menu explanation in the second screenshot on this page. It appears that the gameplay gets slower the smaller the resolution is used, so 1280x720 is recommended for normal gameplay speed. The Quit button doesn't work, so if you are in fullscreen press alt+f4 to exit the game :))
